channel.title: hugo on Cookie's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Cookie's Notes

item.title: My First Post
item.description: My goal for a while has been to create a webiste, but I would get quickly overwhelmed everytime I tried starting. Hugo has been a huge help to get me over that hurdle. I hope to use this website to post my notes. I followed a video tutorial to get myself started using Hugo. [Video Link] Hugo Hugo makes static websites, static websites load faster than dynamic websites that use things like wordpress.
